metadata.title: FileHash Enrichment - Palo Alto Wildfire
metadata.description: This playbook used to enrich sentinel incident with filehash information
mainSteps: 1. Fetches detailed verdict information of the fileHash.
2. Enriches the incident with verdict information based on the verdict values (benign, phishing, malware, grayware).
prerequisites: 1. Palo Alto WildFire Custom Connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same resource group.
2. Generate wildfire API key to establish the connection to wildfire custom connector.

metadata.description: Enter Palo Alto WildFire Custom Connector Name
Enter DL or SOC Email Address for receiving filehash report

columns.value: The sample is safe and does not exhibit malicious behavior.

Create_HTML_for_benign_FileHash_verdict.description: To create HTML table for incident comment

Add_incident_URL_to_Email.description: To compose incident URL for email body

inputs.name: IncidentComment

Create_HTML_table_for_file_information.description: To create html table for incident comment

Create_HTML_table_for_task_information.description: To create html table for incident comment

file_signer.description: File Signer of the verdict report

filetype.description: File Type of the verdict report

body.Body:
@{outputs('WildFire_Logo')}@{outputs('Azure_Sentinel_Logo')}

Palo Alto WildFire FileHash verdict report (@{items('For_each_FileHash')?['Value']})

* Summary of FileHash verdict report was posted as a comment to the incident. @{outputs('Add_incident_URL_to_Email')}
* Attached is full report.


Note: This is an automatic mail sent by Azure Sentinel playbook.
body.Subject: INC#@{triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['incidentNumber']} - Palo Alto WildFire FileHash Verdict Report (@{items('For_each_FileHash')?['Value']})

Send_email_with_FileHash_attachment.description: To send an email for the SOC user with report in the PDF format

Construct_verdict_JSON.description: To construct JSON object for XML
